p: The CT changes are of four stages: a. Early stage of ground glass opacities (GGO) in sub-pleural distribution involving mainly lower lobes. b. Progressive stage of multi-lobe distribution with GGO, bilateral consolidation of airspaces ( Fig. 1 ). c. Peak stage of dense consolidation in almost all cases ( Fig. 2 ). d. Absorption stage denotes GGO without crazy paving pattern.
